advancements.lightmanscurrency.atm.descr: Создайте Банкомат. Его можно использовать для обмена монет и получения доступа к своему банковскому аккаунту.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.atm.title: Время подумать по-банковски!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.banker_tr: Купите предмет, относящийся к валютам от банкира.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.cash_regi: Craft a cash register, so that players can interact with all of your nearby traders at once!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.coin_mint: Craft a Coin Mint, so that you can mint your own coins.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.enchanted: Enchant your wallet with the Coin Magnet enchantment.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.event.cho: Play during a special holiday! Unlocks the ability to use chocolate coins as money.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.event.chr: Played during a very jolly time!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.event.val: Played during the celebration of love.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.jar_of_su: WHY DID IT HAVE TO BE SOUP!?
advancements.lightmanscurrency.netherite: Создайте незеритовый кошелек, самый вместительный и стойкий кошелек в мире!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.network_t: Создайте network trader, чтобы продавать свои предметы любому, куда угодно!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.root.desc: Накопляя состояние и торгуя с игроками.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.specialty: Craft a specialty item trader. Be careful, as they have special rules limiting how their trades are defined.
Создайте торговый терминал. Он позволит получить доступ к сетевым торговцам с любой точки мира.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trader.de: Создайте любой Item Trader, чтобы торговать с вашими друзьями!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trader_in: Создайте trader interface, чтобы автоматизировать торговлю или пополнение через a network trader!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trading_c: Создайте Ядро обмена! Оно необходимо для создания торговых аппаратов.
advancements.lightmanscurrency.wallet_cr: Создайте свой первый кошелек. Его можно использовать для хранения монет!

tooltip.lightmanscurrency.atm.1: Can exchange coins for other coins of higher or lower values.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.atm.2: Can deposit or withdraw coins from your bank account.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.atm.3: Can access any Team bank accounts you have access to.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.atm.4: Can transfer money from your account to another player or teams account.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.auction.cancel: Will cancel the auction. The latest bid will be refunded, and your items will be returned to your inventory.
Will cancel the auction. The latest bid will be refunded, and your items will be sent to your storage.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.beta: Feature in beta stage. May have issues!
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.cashregister.1: Can be used to link and interact with multiple local traders at the same time.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.coinmint.melta: Can melt coins back into their base materials.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.coinmint.minta: Can mint coins from their base materials.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.interface.item: Can be used to automatically purchase or sell items from any network item trader.
Can be used to automatically drain or restock from a network item trader you have permission to.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.ownable.anarch: Server is in Anarchy Mode. Block will not be break-protected!
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.paygate.2: Can be used to trigger a redstone signal for a price.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.paygate.3: Can be linked to a ticket for easier customer interactions.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.persistent.add: Create a Persistent Auction with the given data.
Create a Persistent Trader with a copy of this traders trades & name.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.settings.name: Имя автомата
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.slot_machine.u: Slot Machine is not yet set up!
Can be placed and used to collect taxes from Trader sales within an area.
Can only be activated by an admin!
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.team.name: Название
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.ticket.pass: Will not be consumed by Paygates
Can be used to print unique Master and Slave tickets.
Tickets can be used with the Paygate, or used as coupons for barter trades.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.item.2: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter items with other players.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.item.ar: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter armor pieces with other players.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.item.bo: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter books pieces with other players.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.item.ti: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter tickets and ticket materials with other players.
A master ticket is required in order to sell tickets.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.network: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter items with other players from any location.
Can only be accessed via a Trading Terminal.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.slot_ma: Can be used to Sell owner-defined random Items or Money to other players
with owner-defined odds of receiving each loot pool.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.storage: Give Ticket Stubs to the Customer
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.tax_inf: No active Tax Collectors in range
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.coin_c: Allows the Money Chest to automatically Deposit or Withdraw from a Bank Account of choice.
Allows the Money Chest to automatically exchange coins upon insertion.
Allows the Money Chest to collect coin items up to %sm away.
Allows the Money Chest to be protected from destruction by other players, and blocks access from other players as well.
Requires set-up, will not function automatically.
You do not have permission to access the chest.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.hopper: Allows the block to collect inputs from its neighboring containers.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.item_c: Increases item trader storage capacity by %s.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.networ: Makes a trader visible from a trading terminal.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.speed: Decreases the delay between interactions by %s ticks.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.wallet.bankacc: Can deposit or withdraw coins to/from your bank account in the UI.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.wallet.convert: Перевести все монеты в самые дорогие
Can collect coins up to %sm away.
Shift + Правый клик на торговый автомат, чтобы привязать.
